results.deck: The fifth entry in the Metal Gear Solid series recounts the adventures of Punished 'Venom' Snake, as he wakes up from a nine-year coma in 1984 to rebuild his mercenary paradise.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain

results.deck: Blood, souls, and tears are continually spent as players traverse the land of Drangleic in FromSoftware's third entry in the Souls series.
results.name: Dark Souls II

results.deck: Battlepaths is a 2D turn-based loot-fest action-RPG in the vein of Diablo.
results.name: Battlepaths

results.deck: Disney Infinity is an action-adventure video game based on Disney properties which uses physical toy figures. The game features in-game play sets and a toy box mode that allows users to create levels using mixed-and-matched content.
results.name: Disney Infinity

results.deck: New entry in the Heavy Fire series.
results.name: Heavy Fire: Shattered Spear

results.deck: The denizens of the Marvel Universe battle it out LEGO style.
results.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes

results.deck: 2K Sports' baseball sim for the 2013 season. Tampa Bay Rays' pitcher and reigning Cy Young award winner David Price is featured on the cover.
results.name: MLB 2K13

results.deck: The 2013 installment in the MotoGP franchise.
results.name: MotoGP13

results.deck: A re-release of Dragon's Dogma, Dark Arisen includes a new high level area with new monsters and quests from the original, as well as a handful of refinements to the original game.
results.name: Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen

results.deck: A visual novel, intended as a spin-off to Steins Gate. It was written by Naotaka Hayashi once again, as a collaboration with Zero Escape writer Kotaro Uchikoshi.
results.name: Steins;Gate: Senkei Kousoku no Phenogram

results.deck: Celebrating 25 years of John Madden Football. No correlation to the year 2025.
results.name: Madden NFL 25

results.deck: Yank the top half of a Skylanders toy off of its base and connect it to a different bottom half to make new combinations in the third Skylanders game.
results.name: Skylanders SWAP Force

results.deck: The sixth main installment of the Assassin's Creed franchise, set in the Caribbean during the age of piracy in the early 18th century. Players explore the memories of Edward Kenway, a charismatic pirate (turned reckless Assassin) and the grandfather of Connor Kenway, the protagonist of Assassin's Creed III.
results.name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag

results.deck: The tenth installment of the long-running shooter franchise introduces a brand new storyline, where the United States is under threat from a coalition of South American nations, and must employ a special group of operatives known as "Ghosts" to survive.
results.name: Call of Duty: Ghosts

results.deck: A supernatural mystery game in which Ronan O’Connor, deceased detective, tries to solve his own murder.
results.name: Murdered: Soul Suspect

results.deck: A direct sequel/expansion to Armored Core V developed by FromSoftware for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Armored Core: Verdict Day

results.deck: WWE 2K14 is the first WWE game to be published by 2K Games.
results.name: WWE 2K14

results.deck: Game based on the Turbo movie by DreamWorks
results.name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad

results.deck: An ordinary mercenary is possessed by a fire demon, who just might grant the power to save the world from a massive army of the undead, in this fantasy action-RPG by French developer Spiders.
results.name: Bound By Flame

results.deck: A first-person action-adventure game by Polish developer, Farm 51 and publisher, Nordic Games.
results.name: Deadfall Adventures

results.deck: In Sniper Elite III, players once again take on the role of World War II sniper Karl Fairburne, this time as he travels to Northern Africa to uncover a secret Nazi plot.
results.name: Sniper Elite III

results.deck: Firebrand and Activision's new racer based on the crazy (and) successful movie franchise, bringing storylines from earlier movies together to lead up to Fast 6.
results.name: Fast & Furious: Showdown

results.deck: The Director's Cut of Deus Ex: Human Revolution features redone boss battles, improved graphics, A.I. and combat, and all DLC released for the original game. The Wii U version makes use of the controller's screen to allow new features like map notes.
results.name: Deus Ex: Human Revolution Director's Cut

results.deck: A 2013 bullet hell shooter from Moss.
results.name: Caladrius

results.deck: Two years after beginning his crime-fighting career, Batman faces his toughest challenge ever when the crime lord known as Black Mask hires the eight deadliest assassins in the DC Universe to kill the vigilante who has been interfering in his operations.
results.name: Batman: Arkham Origins

results.deck: A football simulator played in god mode.
results.name: Lords of Football

results.deck: Based on the film of the same name.
results.name: The Smurfs 2

results.deck: Expanded version of the 2007 subscription MMO based on the Monster Hunter franchise.
results.name: Monster Hunter Frontier G

results.deck: The 22nd installment in the EA Sports NHL franchise.
results.name: NHL 14

results.deck: The 2014 installment in EA Canada's soccer simulation franchise. This was the first in the franchise to bridge the 360/PS3 to Xbox One/PS4 gap.
results.name: FIFA 14

results.deck: The 2013 entry in EA Sports' college football franchise, featuring former Michigan Quarterback Denard Robinson on the cover.
results.name: NCAA Football 14

results.deck: A compilation of two arcade shooters, XIIZeal and ΔZEAL, for Xbox 360.
results.name: Shooting Love 10th Anniversary

results.deck: Rugby Challenge 2 is a rugby simulation game featuring over 100 licensed teams. It is released under slightly different names in many territories by the Wellington-based developer, Sidhe Interactive.
results.name: Rugby Challenge 2

results.deck: Hunt for treasure to display in the backyard Museum of Cool
results.name: Phineas and Ferb: Quest for Cool Stuff

results.deck: Dungeon RPG from Experience and Kadokawa Games.
results.name: Stranger of Sword City

results.deck: A visual novel adaptation of the Muv-Luv Alternative: Total Eclipse light novels and anime, it is a side story of Muv-Luv Alternative that follows the test pilots at humanity's main R&D facility in Alaska.
results.name: Muv-Luv Alternative: Total Eclipse

results.deck: The latest entry in the venerable shooter franchise takes place in a version of the 1960s in which the Nazis have established a global empire after winning World War II. Protagonist B.J. Blazkowicz fights for an underground resistance movement, outnumbered and outgunned by high-tech Nazi forces.
results.name: Wolfenstein: The New Order

results.deck: A cross-gen open-world driving game set in a fictional Redview County.
results.name: Need for Speed Rivals

results.deck: Upgraded release of Dead or Alive 5, including: DOA5+ feature integration, more characters, stages, costumes and BGM customization options.
results.name: Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate

results.deck: A platformer based on the 2013 Pac-Man CGI animated series.
results.name: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures

results.deck: The fifteenth installment of 2K Sports' basketball sim arrives just in time for the 2013-14 NBA season.
results.name: NBA 2K14

results.deck: Second game set on the Ben 10: Omniverse cartoon
results.name: Ben 10: Omniverse 2

results.deck: Finn, Jake and others must save the Candy Kingdom by exploring the mysterious Secret Royal Dungeon deep below the Land of Ooo.
results.name: Adventure Time: Explore the Dungeon Because I DON’T KNOW!

results.deck: Cyanide's cycling game for the 2013 Tour de France.
results.name: Le Tour de France 2013 - 100th Edition

results.deck: This entry in the Zumba dance game series has an international theme to its song list.
results.name: Zumba Fitness: World Party

results.deck: Inspired by the classic Walt Disney's Fantasia, Disney Fantasia: Music Evolved gives you control of the beat and rhythm of music through motion.
results.name: Disney Fantasia: Music Evolved

results.deck: A top-down shooter set between the events of Halo 3 and Halo 4, Halo: Spartan Assault details the first Spartan Ops missions of the UNSC SPARTAN-IV Program.
results.name: Halo: Spartan Assault

results.deck: An Xbox 360 remastering of the original Fable game, including the extra (originally cut) content from Fable: The Lost Chapters. Released on February 4, 2014 in both boxed and digital forms.
results.name: Fable Anniversary

results.deck: Set in a far-flung, mech-filled future, Titanfall is the first first-person shooter built by Respawn Entertainment, the studio formed by ex-employees of Call of Duty developer Infinity Ward.
results.name: Titanfall

results.deck: Pro Evo returns for another season.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2014

results.deck: An old-school style, turn based RPG from independent developer, Heartbit Interactive.
results.name: Doom and Destiny

results.deck: Plants and Zombies are once again pitted against each other in this class-based third-person shooter developed by Popcap Games.
results.name: Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare

results.deck: The new title in Ubisoft's hugely successful dance game franchise.
results.name: Just Dance 2014

results.deck: The original zoo-management game returns as a console title (for the Xbox 360 and Xbox One), allowing players to build functioning zoos, to keep animals and guests happy, and to drive around their zoo in a magic buggy. Beep beep.
results.name: Zoo Tycoon

results.deck: The second edition of Rocksmith from Ubisoft features a new soundtrack, enhancements to the user interface, and a slew of new games and lessons aimed at helping learn how to play the guitar.
results.name: Rocksmith 2014

results.deck: A single-player and cooperative driving game that takes place throughout the United States, developed by Ivory Tower.
results.name: The Crew

results.deck: RedLynx takes their bike-platforming franchise to the future (and PlayStation) with the addition of a physics-based trick system.
results.name: Trials Fusion

results.deck: Four-player simultaneous fighting game set in the Dragon Ball Z universe.
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Z

results.deck: A director's cut edition of Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3, and Naruto's official PC game debut.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 Full Burst

results.deck: Australian Rules Football sees it's second release on 360 & PS3
results.name: AFL Live 2

results.deck: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles is a game based on the 2012 Nickelodeon CGI series.
results.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

results.deck: The third major installment of the Street Fighter IV legacy adds characters and stages from Street Fighter X Tekken, a brand new fighter, new gameplay mechanics (including the ability to bring both Ultra Combos into the fight), and a variety of balance tweaks, training enhancements, and new modes.
results.name: Ultra Street Fighter IV

results.deck: F1 2013 is Codemasters' latest entry in the Formula 1 branded series of racing games.
results.name: F1 2013

results.deck: An Action Adventure game based on The LEGO Movie and developed in the style of other TT Games' LEGO videogames.
results.name: The LEGO Movie Videogame

results.deck: Strider Hiryu must assassinate Grandmaster Meio in this action-adventure game from Double Helix and Capcom.
results.name: Strider

results.deck: Graphic novel game from Mages & 5pb.
results.name: Disorder6

results.deck: Zumba wants the kids to get up with this child friendly dance game
results.name: Zumba Kids

results.deck: Stop Plankton's robot army from getting the Krabby Patty secret formula
results.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Plankton's Robotic Revenge

results.deck: The fifth game in Kalypso's dictatorship simulation series. The game improves on trading, technology and research and adds competitive and cooperative multiplayer for the first time in the series.
results.name: Tropico 5

results.deck: Persona 4: Arena Ultimax is a sequel to the original Persona 4 Arena. It has new characters, new stages and several new gameplay related changes such as new moves.
results.name: Persona 4: Arena Ultimax

results.deck: The standalone expansion pack for XCOM: Enemy Unknown adds cybernetic soldiers and aliens, along with new multi-player maps.
results.name: XCOM: Enemy Within

results.deck: An expansion to Diablo III that adds the Crusader class, a new area called Westmarch, and a new evil to fight in Malthael, the angel of death.
results.name: Diablo III: Reaper of Souls

results.deck: Compete for the title of "World's Best Driver" in this toy-themed arcade racer.
results.name: Hot Wheels World's Best Driver

results.deck: An arcade flight simulation during the Vietnam War.
results.name: Air Conflicts: Vietnam

results.deck: An Xbox 360 remake of the first entry in the Tengai Makyou series.
results.name: Tengai Makyou Ziria: Harukanaru Jipang

results.deck: Travel to Africa to hunt the most ferocious beasts alive across 5 different biomes.
results.name: Cabela's African Adventures

results.deck: This game in the Wipeout series allows players to create their own courses to share with friends and family.
results.name: Wipeout: Create & Crash

results.deck: The official Motocross Grand Prix videogame, covering the 2013 season.
results.name: MXGP

results.deck: The sequel to Dancing Stage Universe and only released in Europe.
results.name: Dancing Stage Universe 2

results.deck: A Beenox-developed sequel to the open world web-slinging game. High Voltage Software is developing the 3DS version.
results.name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2

results.deck: A survival horror game set fifteen years after the original Alien film. It stars Amanda Ripley, the daughter of the film's protagonist, Ellen Ripley.
results.name: Alien: Isolation

results.deck: The latest installment of World Rally Championship.
results.name: WRC 4 FIA World Rally Championship

results.deck: An open-world action-adventure game by Monolith, set between the events of The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.
results.name: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor

results.deck: Phantom Breaker: Extra is an extended edition-cum-sequel of the original Phantom Breaker.
results.name: Phantom Breaker: Extra

results.deck: Deep Silver brings NASCAR to PC, PS3 and Xbox 360 for the 2014 season.
results.name: NASCAR ’14

results.deck: The Fourth Shinobi World War continues in the fifth installment of the Ultimate Ninja Storm series.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution

results.deck: LEGO returns to Middle-earth with this video game adaptation of the first two Hobbit movies.
results.name: LEGO The Hobbit

results.deck: Karting game based on the animated series El Chavo del Ocho
results.name: El Chavo Kart

results.deck: WWE 2K15 is the first game in the franchise to appear on the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC.
results.name: WWE 2K15

results.deck: Basketball returns in NBA 2K15.
results.name: NBA 2K15

results.deck: A modified version of FIFA 14 released to coincide with the 2014 World Cup.
results.name: 2014 FIFA World Cup Brazil

results.deck: The eleventh installment of the Call of Duty franchise (and the first spearheaded by Sledgehammer Games) brings modern military thirty years into the future, as new technology (including powered exoskeleton frames and cloaking devices) makes a certain Private Military Corporation the dominant military force of the world.
results.name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare

results.deck: A new Transformers game headed to multiple platforms across home consoles and PC.
results.name: Transformers: Rise of the Dark Spark

results.deck: Independent Bullet Hell shooter featuring a combination of old-school and contemporary gameplay.
results.name: Pester

results.deck: The third game in the Risen series, developed by Piranha Bytes.
results.name: Risen 3: Titan Lords

results.deck: The 2014 edition of the official MotoGP World Championship video game.
results.name: MotoGP 14

results.deck: 2014 installment in the Cabela's franchise
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter: Pro Hunts

results.deck: Dreamworks Animation's How to Train Your Dragon 2 movie tie-in game developed by Torus Games.
results.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2

results.deck: An officially-licensed handball game featuring over eighty real-world teams.
results.name: IHF Handball Challenge 14

results.deck: A cricket game for PC, Xbox 360, PS3, Xbox One and PS4, bearing the name of the late, legendary Australian batsman Don Bradman.
results.name: Don Bradman Cricket 14
